mapper.insert: insert into `im-system`.im_friendship_group (friendship_group_owner_id, friendship_group_name, app_id, friendship_group_create_time, friendship_group_update_time) values (#{group.groupOwnerId}, #{group.groupName}, #{appId}, #{group.createTime}, #{group.updateTime})
mapper.select: select friendship_group_id, friendship_group_owner_id, friendship_group_name, friendship_group_is_del, app_id from `im-system`.im_friendship_group where app_id = #{appId} and friendship_group_id = #{groupId} and friendship_group_is_del = 0
